name: node-red-contrib-sia-server
description: Node-RED node for SIA DC-09 IP server (alarm receiver) with full support for Honeywell Galaxy Dimension Level 4 (DC-09) including CRC-16 XModem/X.25/ARC, AES, polling, keep-alive, multi-fragmentation, multiplexed packets, extensions, diagnostics, push-webhook, PCVue mapping, and Virtual Galaxy Receiver compatibility.
